narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
The applicant wishes to be licensed by USDA with a new Class A - Breeder/Dealer license.
The applicant will submit all license applicable fees to the USDA-APHIS-AC Regional Office in Raleigh, North
Carolina for processing.  The mailing address where the applicant needs to submit the license fees is as follows:
     United States Department of Agriculture
     Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service
     Animal Care
     Marketing & Regulatory Program Business Services
     920 Main Campus Drive
     Suite 200
     Raleigh, NC 27606-5213
No USDA regulated activities are permitted at the premises until the USDA license is issued and received by the
applicant.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant, Mr. Tom Nickerson.  Also present were two
facility representatives, Mrs. Ida Nickerson and Miss Farrah Nickerson.
